Package org.apache.tools.ant.types.resources

Class ZipResource

java.lang.Object
org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType
org.apache.tools.ant.types.Resource
org.apache.tools.ant.types.resources.ArchiveResource
org.apache.tools.ant.types.resources.ZipResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Comparable<Resource>, Iterable<Resource>, ResourceCollection
public class ZipResource extends ArchiveResource
A Resource representation of an entry in a zipfile.
Since:
Ant 1.7
